trans-unit.source: Provides the functionality that allows a common language runtime host to participate in the flow, or migration, of the execution context.
trans-unit.target: 提供可讓通用語言執行階段主應用程式參與的流程或移轉，執行內容的功能。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.AppDomainManager> has a reference to a HostExecutionContextManager in its <xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A> property, then the common language runtime calls the manager every time a call to the <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method occurs, to allow the host to participate in the flow of the execution context.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前<xref:System.AppDomainManager>HostExecutionContextManager 中參考其<xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A>屬性，則 common language runtime 呼叫管理員每次呼叫<xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，就會發生，允許主應用程式參與的執行內容的流程。</xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A> </xref:System.AppDomainManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Captures the host execution context from the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 擷取從目前的執行緒的主控件執行內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> is created using a safe handle containing the `IUnknown` pointer for the host executing the current thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>使用安全控制代碼，包含建立`IUnknown`主機執行目前執行緒的指標。</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"></xref> object representing the host execution context of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"> </xref>物件，代表目前執行緒的主控件執行內容。

trans-unit.source: Restores the host execution context to its prior state.
trans-unit.target: 將主控件執行內容還原到先前的狀態。

trans-unit.source: `previousState` must be the object returned by the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `previousState`必須物件傳回<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A>方法。</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The previous context state to revert to.
trans-unit.target: 若要還原為先前的內容狀態。

trans-unit.source: previousState is .
trans-unit.target: previousStateis .

trans-unit.source: -or- previousState was not created on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: -或-previousState不是目前的執行緒上。

trans-unit.source: -or- previousState is not the last state for the .
trans-unit.target: -previousState不是最後狀態 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current host execution context to the specified host execution context.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的主機執行內容設定為指定的主機執行內容。

trans-unit.source: The SetHostExecutionContext method sets the host execution context for the current <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>.
trans-unit.target: SetHostExecutionContext 方法設定的主機執行內容目前<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> that has been used as the argument to another SetHostExecutionContext method call cannot be passed in as the parameter for this method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>，已使用另一個 SetHostExecutionContext 方法呼叫的引數不能傳入做為這個方法的參數。</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create a copy of a <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> object and then use the copy to set the host execution context.
trans-unit.target: 請改用<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法來建立一份<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>物件，然後使用複製設定的主機執行內容。</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> </xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A> method using the object returned by this method to restore the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A>方法使用這個方法所傳回的物件還原<xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>至其先前的狀態。</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> </xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"></xref> to be set.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"> </xref>設定。

trans-unit.source: An object for restoring the <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"></xref> to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: 還原物件<xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"></xref>至其先前的狀態。

trans-unit.source: hostExecutionContext was not acquired through a capture operation.
trans-unit.target: hostExecutionContext取得透過擷取作業。

trans-unit.source: -or- hostExecutionContext has been the argument to a previous SetHostExecutionContext method call.
trans-unit.target: -或-hostExecutionContext已先前 SetHostExecutionContext 方法呼叫的引數。
